title: [GAMEPLAY] Ezreal Q mystic shot not proccing Deathfire touch
body: just played a game with ezreal and his q did not proc deathfire touch is this a bug? cause i know that his q counts as a basic attack where it applies on hit effects such as lich bane and other sheen items, but is his Q not counted as an damaging ability?

replies.body: As you mentioned, it is counted as a basic attack meaning it is not counted as a spell, so is not intended to proc DFT.
